synonyms: haridāsa-dvārā—by Haridāsa Ṭhākura; nāma-māhātmya—of the glories of chanting the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra; prakāśa—manifestation; sanātana-dvārā—by Sanātana Gosvāmī; bhakti-siddhānta-vilāsa—spreading the essence of devotional life.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu exhibited the glories of the holy name of the Lord through Haridāsa Ṭhākura, who was born in a Mohammedan family. Similarly, He exhibited the essence of devotional service through Sanātana Gosvāmī, who had almost been converted into a Mohammedan.
